entry.title: Blissful Baby Massage Oil: Massage oil for babies over 12 weeks old
entry.summary:
Vendor: Feelgood Health
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 117.00

Feelgood Health's Blissful Baby Massage Oil  contains a blend of aromatherapy oils especially chosen for babies over 12 weeks old. 
  • Pure aromatherapy essential oils calm and relax your baby
  • Massage strengthens the bonding process
  • Soothes teething and colicky babies 
  • For improved circulation throughout your baby’s body
  • For after-bath or bedtime relaxation to assist with sleep
  • Aids neurological development through massage
  • Pure aromatherapy essential oils 

Ingredients

Mandarin essential oil, Chamomile essential oil,  Neroli essential oil, Almond oil (carrier oil)

 

Directions for use

With aromatherapy, a little goes a long way!  Pour a little oil into the palm of the hand and rub together to warm the oil.  Massage slowly and gently, avoiding the face and genital area. Lovely to use anytime, but especially after a bath or before bedtime! 

(Tip: You can also use a cap full in the bath before bedtime!) 

Note:
Not recommended for babies under 3 months. May contain traces of nut oil. For external use only.

 

    Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: African Calming Massage Oil Blend | Pure Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 60.50

Pure Indigenous' African Calm Massage Oil (100ml) contains carefully selected indigenous essential oils to promote inner calm, tranquility and relaxation.

  • Free yourself from stress and tension with this calming massage oil blend
  • Used as a body oil OR a massage oil, it promotes skin's elasticity and suppleness

Ingredients

Kenyan Frankincense, Cape Rose Geranium, African Wormwood, Cape Grape Seed Oil

How to use

Apply a few drops of Calm Massage Oil to the skin or hair for a nourishing treatment. All of Pure Indigenous's carrier oils are also an ideal base to combine a few drops of essential oils for a true Aromatherapy experience.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 530.00

Ohm Oils' Wood Grain Ultrasonic Cool Mist Aroma Diffuser (200ml) improves your home’s atmosphere quality, covers unwanted smells, and releases the therapeutic mist of your favourite essential oils into your space.
  • Ultrasonic technology to create a soft environment by adding essential oils
  • Suitable for spas, salons, offices, kids' rooms, living rooms, etc.
  • Set the time mode via the controller, up to 8 hours’ working time
  • Refreshes and moisturizes the air for rooms of 20-40 m²
  • Safe for children and pregnant women
  • Diffuser will switch off automatically when time is up or water runs out (safer, especially for children)
  • The LED can be set to 7 different gentle and soothing colors
BPA-free
Light: Warm light & 7 color LED light
Working time: 6-8 hours
Product size: 93x157mm
Usage area: 20-40 m²

entry.title: OHM Eucalyptus Essential Oil: Therapeutic Grade (10 ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 23.00

This 100% pure 10ml essential Eucalyptus Oil by OHM Oils (Eucalyptus Smithii) really helps to clear the chest and can be used in an oil burner or diffuser, as a steam inhalation, in the bath or diluted as a massage oil

  • Helps to clear nasal congestion and open up the chest
  • Often used to support the respiratory system and clear sinusitis
  • Very useful in massage oils or steam baths to help colds & 'flu
  • Eucalyptus has anti-viral properties and can protect against viral infections of the respiratory tract
  • Proudly made in South Africa

HOW TO USE

Eucalyptus Oil may be used diluted or directly on the skin as needed

1. Use a few drops in an oil burner or diffuser to fill the air with the healing benefits
2. Add 3 - 5 drops to your bath or as a steam inhalation

3. Add 3 - 5 drops to 10 ml massage oil and use a a chest and back rub

Please note: Essential Oils should not be taken internally. Not recommended during pregnancy. 

OHM Oils is a range of pure essential oils and essential oil blends that is true to the principle of ESSENCE. They believe that an essential oil is a gift of the essence or the spirit of the plant, providing healing and upliftment to those that use it. 

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

This delightfully fresh citrus-scented essential oil is popular with aromatherapists for its mood lifting effects. It also has anti-fungal and anti-bacterial properties, as well as many other therapeutic uses 

  • Sweet, uplifting citrus scent will freshen any home

  • May be used topically to treat fungal infections like Athlete's Foot, nail fungus and ringworm, as well as acne

Lemongrass Oil may be used in a number of ways"

entry.title: Ohm Natural Lice Treatment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Oils
Price: 50.00

Ohm Oil's Natural Lice Treatment (50ml) is non-toxic, containing Tea Tree Oil and Neem Oil.

  • Effective and popular non-toxic lice treatment
  • Both Tea Tree Oil and Neem Oil are effective in lice control and also contain compounds that disrupt the life cycle of the louse
  • Powerful antioxidant, moisturiser and revitaliser for scalp and hair
  • Also good for dry skin and dandruff
  • Locally produced to reduce your carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Organic Grape Seed Oil, Neem Oil and Tea Tree Oil.

How to use

Massage onto scalp and hair and comb through with a fine tooth nit comb. Leave on for approximately 20 - 30 minutes before washing hair. (We recommend washing with Treemendous Tea Tree Shampoo after treatment). Depending on the severity of louse infestation, you may have to repeat treatment in a few days. 

Caution: Not recommended for use during pregnancy

Note: Make sure that all bedding is changed and that the living and sleeping areas are thoroughly cleaned and vacuumed. All members of the family should be treated to prevent re-infestation.

entry.title: OHM Pure Essential Grapefruit Oil: Therapeutic Grade
entry.summary:

Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 40.50

Ohm Oil's Grapefruit Essential Oil (10ml) has a sweet citric and fruity aroma that is one of the most popular oils to provide an invigorating and energizing effect!
  • Helps to uplift the mood, increase motivation, boost energy levels and improve feelings of confidence and happiness
  • Great to use in the workplace or while you're getting tasks done at home 
  • Stimulates circulation which helps improve brain health, reduce swelling and optimise all bodily functions
  • Reduces feelings of stress, tension, low self-confidence, sadness, anxiety, lethargy, dizziness, and fatigue
  • Lymphatic action helps with detox, cellulite, toning and weight-loss
  • Promote the appearance of clear, healthy-looking skin when applied topically and works magic for skin imperfections and oily skin types - a must have for those who suffer from acne (just one drop on affected area does the trick!)
  • Grapefruit essential oil is also used as a hangover cure - rub on the temples or add to a massage carrier oil to relieve headaches or migraines!
  • Support local! Proudly made in South Africa

Ingredients

100% pure Grapefruit essential oil

How to use

Grapefruit essential oil may be used in a number of ways:

1. Use a few drops in an oil burner or diffuser to fill the air with the healing benefits
2. Add 3 - 5 drops to your bath
3. Add 3 - 5 drops to 10 ml massage oil

Please note: Essential Oils should not be taken internally. Not recommended during pregnancy.
